resources.string: No server name specified. Enter a valid one and try again.
No server host specified. Enter a valid one and try again.
No server port specified. Enter a valid one and try again.
No server password specified. Enter a valid one and try again.
Invalid server port specified. Valid port must be a numerical value (usually 25575).
Invalid server name. That particular one already exists.
NullPointerException during server store. Clear app data in Android application settings or reinstall.
IOException during server store. Clear app data in Android application settings or reinstall.
No servers have been added. Please add one from the menu at the top.

Each server takes a name, hostname or IP, rcon port, and rcon password. The server name is just for identification on the server list. The hostname is the external IP. The RCON port and password match rcon.port and rcon.password, set in server.properties respectively. Finally, enable-rcon must be set to true, otherwise connections will be declined. If all settings given here are correct, verify that a firewall is not blocking connections to the server rcon port.
Ready.\nIssue a server command. Its output will be displayed here.\n
Unable to authenticate with server. Please verify that a connection is available and the server's connection information is correct.
